recipes.name: Old Fashioned
recipes.instructions: Muddle sugar cube and bitters with a splash of water in a rocks glass. Add ice and bourbon. Stir gently for 30 seconds. Express orange peel over the drink and garnish.

recipes.name: Manhattan
recipes.instructions: Add rye whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters to a mixing glass with ice. Stir for 30 seconds. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a cherry.

recipes.name: Whiskey Sour
recipes.instructions: Add bourbon, lemon juice, and simple syrup to a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously for 15 seconds. Strain into a rocks glass with fresh ice. Garnish with cherry and orange slice.

recipes.name: Margarita
recipes.instructions: Rim a rocks glass with salt. Add tequila, lime juice, and triple sec to a shaker with ice. Shake well for 15 seconds. Strain into the prepared glass with fresh ice. Garnish with lime wheel.

recipes.name: Mojito
recipes.instructions: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice in a highball glass. Add rum and fill with ice. Top with soda water and stir. Garnish with mint sprig and lime wheel.

recipes.name: Daiquiri
recipes.instructions: Add white rum, lime juice, and simple syrup to a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously for 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with lime wheel.

recipes.name: Martini
recipes.instructions: Add gin and dry vermouth to a mixing glass with ice. Stir for 30 seconds until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with lemon twist or olives.

recipes.name: Negroni
recipes.instructions: Add gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth to a rocks glass with ice. Stir gently for 20 seconds. Garnish with orange peel.

recipes.name: Moscow Mule
recipes.instructions: Add vodka and lime juice to a copper mug with ice. Top with ginger beer and stir gently. Garnish with lime wheel and mint sprig.

recipes.name: Cosmopolitan
recipes.instructions: Add vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and lime juice to a shaker with ice. Shake well for 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with lime wheel.

recipes.name: Mai Tai
recipes.instructions: Add rum, orange curaçao, lime juice, and orgeat syrup to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a rocks glass with crushed ice. Float dark rum on top. Garnish with mint and lime.

recipes.name: Mint Julep
recipes.instructions: Muddle mint leaves with simple syrup in a julep cup. Fill with crushed ice and add bourbon. Stir gently. Top with more crushed ice. Garnish with mint sprig.

recipes.name: Gimlet
recipes.instructions: Add gin and lime juice to a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously for 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with lime wheel.

recipes.name: Tom Collins
recipes.instructions: Add gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a Collins glass with ice. Top with soda water. Garnish with lemon wheel and cherry.

recipes.name: Sazerac
recipes.instructions: Rinse a rocks glass with absinthe and discard excess. In a mixing glass, muddle sugar cube with bitters and a splash of water. Add rye whiskey and ice, stir well. Strain into the prepared glass. Garnish with lemon peel.

recipes.name: Paloma
recipes.instructions: Rim a highball glass with salt. Add tequila and lime juice to the glass with ice. Top with grapefruit soda. Stir gently. Garnish with grapefruit wedge.

recipes.name: Boulevardier
recipes.instructions: Add bourbon, Campari, and sweet vermouth to a mixing glass with ice. Stir for 30 seconds. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with orange peel.

recipes.name: Dark and Stormy
recipes.instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add dark rum and top with ginger beer. Stir gently. Garnish with lime wheel.

recipes.name: Aperol Spritz
recipes.instructions: Fill a wine glass with ice. Add Aperol and prosecco. Top with a splash of soda water. Stir gently. Garnish with orange slice.

recipes.name: Sidecar
recipes.instructions: Add cognac, triple sec, and lemon juice to a shaker with ice. Shake well for 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled coupe glass with sugared rim. Garnish with lemon twist.

recipes.name: French 75
recipes.instructions: Add gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a champagne flute. Top with champagne. Garnish with lemon twist.

recipes.name: Pisco Sour
recipes.instructions: Add pisco, lime juice, simple syrup, and egg white to a shaker without ice. Dry shake for 10 seconds. Add ice and shake vigorously for 15 seconds. Strain into a rocks glass. Top with Angostura bitters.

recipes.name: Rusty Nail
recipes.instructions: Add scotch and Drambuie to a rocks glass with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon twist.

recipes.name: Rob Roy
recipes.instructions: Add scotch, sweet vermouth, and bitters to a mixing glass with ice. Stir for 30 seconds. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with cherry.

recipes.name: Piña Colada
recipes.instructions: Add white rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice to a blender with ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass. Garnish with pineapple wedge and cherry.

recipes.name: Corpse Reviver No. 2
recipes.instructions: Add gin, Lillet Blanc, triple sec, lemon juice, and a dash of absinthe to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with cherry.

recipes.name: Vieux Carré
recipes.instructions: Add rye whiskey, cognac, sweet vermouth, Bénédictine, and bitters to a mixing glass with ice. Stir well. Strain into a rocks glass with ice. Garnish with lemon peel.

recipes.name: Americano
recipes.instructions: Add Campari and sweet vermouth to a rocks glass with ice. Top with soda water. Stir gently. Garnish with orange slice.

recipes.name: Blood and Sand
recipes.instructions: Add scotch, cherry liqueur, sweet vermouth, and orange juice to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with orange twist.

recipes.name: Aviation
recipes.instructions: Add gin, maraschino liqueur, crème de violette, and lemon juice to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with cherry.

recipes.name: Last Word
recipes.instructions: Add gin, green Chartreuse, maraschino liqueur, and lime juice to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with lime wheel.

recipes.name: Penicillin
recipes.instructions: Add scotch, lemon juice, honey-ginger syrup, and ginger to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a rocks glass with ice. Float Islay scotch on top. Garnish with candied ginger.

recipes.name: Bee's Knees
recipes.instructions: Add gin, lemon juice, and honey syrup to a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

recipes.name: Bramble
recipes.instructions: Add gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a rocks glass with crushed ice. Drizzle blackberry liqueur over the top. Garnish with blackberries and lemon slice.

recipes.name: Clover Club
recipes.instructions: Add gin, lemon juice, raspberry syrup, and egg white to a shaker without ice. Dry shake for 10 seconds. Add ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with raspberries.

recipes.name: Espresso Martini
recipes.instructions: Add vodka, coffee liqueur, espresso, and simple syrup to a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously for 20 seconds. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with coffee beans.

recipes.name: Vesper
recipes.instructions: Add gin, vodka, and Lillet Blanc to a mixing glass with ice. Stir well for 30 seconds. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with lemon twist.

recipes.name: Hanky Panky
recipes.instructions: Add gin, sweet vermouth, and Fernet-Branca to a mixing glass with ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with orange twist.

recipes.name: Southside
recipes.instructions: Muddle mint leaves in a shaker. Add gin, lime juice, and simple syrup with ice. Shake well. Double strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with mint leaf.

recipes.name: Zombie
recipes.instructions: Add white rum, dark rum, spiced rum, lime juice, grapefruit juice, and syrups to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a tiki mug with crushed ice. Garnish with mint and pineapple.

recipes.name: Caipirinha
recipes.instructions: Muddle lime wedges with sugar in a rocks glass. Fill with crushed ice and add cachaça. Stir well. Garnish with lime wheel.

recipes.name: Tequila Sunrise
recipes.instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add tequila and orange juice, stir gently. Slowly pour grenadine down the side to create sunrise effect. Garnish with orange slice and cherry.

recipes.name: El Presidente
recipes.instructions: Add white rum, dry vermouth, orange curaçao, and grenadine to a mixing glass with ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with orange twist.

recipes.name: Paper Plane
recipes.instructions: Add bourbon, Aperol, Amaro Nonino, and lemon juice to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. No garnish needed.

recipes.name: Suffering Bastard
recipes.instructions: Add bourbon, gin, lime juice, and bitters to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a Collins glass with ice. Top with ginger beer. Garnish with mint and cucumber.

recipes.name: Brandy Alexander
recipes.instructions: Add cognac, crème de cacao, and heavy cream to a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with grated nutmeg.

recipes.name: Whiskey Smash
recipes.instructions: Muddle lemon wedges and mint in a shaker. Add bourbon and simple syrup with ice. Shake well. Strain into a rocks glass with crushed ice. Garnish with mint sprig.

recipes.name: Pornstar Martini
recipes.instructions: Add vanilla vodka, passion fruit liqueur, passion fruit purée, lime juice, and simple syrup to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Serve with a shot of champagne on the side. Garnish with passion fruit half.

recipes.name: Amaretto Sour
recipes.instructions: Add amaretto, bourbon, lemon juice, and simple syrup to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a rocks glass with ice. Garnish with cherry and orange slice.

recipes.name: Irish Coffee
recipes.instructions: Preheat a glass mug with hot water. Discard water and add sugar and hot coffee. Stir to dissolve. Add Irish whiskey. Top with lightly whipped cream by pouring over the back of a spoon.

recipes.name: Hot Toddy
recipes.instructions: Add bourbon, honey, and lemon juice to a mug. Fill with hot water and stir. Garnish with lemon wheel and cinnamon stick.

recipes.name: Singapore Sling
recipes.instructions: Add gin, cherry liqueur, Bénédictine, lime juice, and grenadine to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a Collins glass with ice. Top with soda water and pineapple juice. Garnish with pineapple and cherry.

recipes.name: Long Island Iced Tea
recipes.instructions: Add vodka, rum, gin, tequila, triple sec, lemon juice, and simple syrup to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a Collins glass with ice. Top with cola. Garnish with lemon wheel.

recipes.name: Pimm's Cup
recipes.instructions: Fill a Collins glass with ice. Add Pimm's No. 1 and lemon juice. Top with ginger ale or lemonade. Stir gently. Garnish with cucumber, strawberry, mint, and orange slice.

recipes.name: Ramos Gin Fizz
recipes.instructions: Add gin, lemon juice, lime juice, simple syrup, cream, egg white, and orange flower water to a shaker without ice. Dry shake for 1 minute. Add ice and shake vigorously for another minute. Strain into a Collins glass. Top with soda water. No garnish.

recipes.name: Kir Royale
recipes.instructions: Pour crème de cassis into a champagne flute. Top with champagne. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon twist.

recipes.name: Bellini
recipes.instructions: Pour white peach purée into a champagne flute. Top with prosecco. Stir gently. Garnish with peach slice.

recipes.name: Mimosa
recipes.instructions: Pour orange juice into a champagne flute. Top with champagne. Stir gently. Garnish with orange twist.

recipes.name: Stinger
recipes.instructions: Add cognac and white crème de menthe to a mixing glass with ice. Stir well. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with mint leaf.

recipes.name: Grasshopper
recipes.instructions: Add crème de menthe, white crème de cacao, and heavy cream to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with grated chocolate.

recipes.name: White Russian
recipes.instructions: Add vodka and coffee liqueur to a rocks glass with ice. Stir gently. Float heavy cream on top. Do not stir.

recipes.name: Black Russian
recipes.instructions: Add vodka and coffee liqueur to a rocks glass with ice. Stir gently. No garnish.

recipes.name: Godfather
recipes.instructions: Add scotch and amaretto to a rocks glass with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with orange twist.

recipes.name: Godmother
recipes.instructions: Add vodka and amaretto to a rocks glass with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon twist.

recipes.name: Colorado Bulldog
recipes.instructions: Add vodka and coffee liqueur to a rocks glass with ice. Top with heavy cream. Finish with a splash of cola. Stir gently.

recipes.name: Vodka Martini
recipes.instructions: Add vodka and dry vermouth to a mixing glass with ice. Stir for 30 seconds until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with lemon twist or olives.

recipes.name: Bloody Mary
recipes.instructions: Add vodka, tomato juice, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, salt, and pepper to a shaker with ice. Roll (gently pour between shakers) to mix. Pour into a highball glass. Garnish with celery, lemon wedge, and olives.

recipes.name: Screwdriver
recipes.instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add vodka and orange juice. Stir gently. Garnish with orange slice.

recipes.name: Sea Breeze
recipes.instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add vodka, cranberry juice, and grapefruit juice. Stir gently. Garnish with lime wedge.

recipes.name: Kamikaze
recipes.instructions: Add vodka, triple sec, and lime juice to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled shot glass or serve in a rocks glass with ice. Garnish with lime wheel.

recipes.name: Smoking Gun
recipes.instructions: Add mezcal, lime juice, and agave syrup to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a rocks glass with ice. Garnish with lime wheel and chili salt rim.

recipes.name: Oaxaca Old Fashioned
recipes.instructions: Add tequila, mezcal, agave syrup, and bitters to a mixing glass with ice. Stir well. Strain into a rocks glass with a large ice cube. Express orange peel over drink and garnish.

recipes.name: Presbyterian
recipes.instructions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add bourbon. Top with equal parts ginger ale and soda water. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon twist.

recipes.name: Horse's Neck
recipes.instructions: Place a long spiral of lemon peel in a highball glass. Fill with ice. Add brandy and top with ginger ale. Stir gently.

recipes.name: Presbyterian Cocktail
recipes.instructions: Fill a rocks glass with ice. Add rye whiskey, sweet vermouth, and Bénédictine. Stir well. Garnish with lemon twist.

recipes.name: Brown Derby
recipes.instructions: Add bourbon, grapefruit juice, and honey syrup to a shaker with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with grapefruit twist.
